EmailTemplate.description: email send as notification once the Territory Analysis job completes
EmailTemplate.name: VDT_TerritoryAnalysisFinished
EmailTemplate.subject: Territory Analysis for {!IF(VDT_Data_Calculation__c.VDT_Country__c ="",VDT_Data_Calculation__c.Territory__c, VDT_Data_Calculation__c.VDT_Country__c)} Finished!
